segments.text: Would you like some more coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No thanks . I'm full . We need to find our waitress and get our bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The service this evening has kind of sucked . Is that our server over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go get the check , since our server doesn't seem to be headed this way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I'll just stay here until you get back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So the total is $ 36.00 for our dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much of a tip do you think our waitress deserves ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if no tip would be appropriate in light of the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I kind of feel the same way , but they may have just been really short-staffed tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that we should leave 10 % .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 3.60 will be the right amount for the tip .
segments.speaker: S2
